articles.author: Fraser Gilbert
articles.title: Strange Xbox Email Suggests Game Pass Price Increase Doesn't Apply To Certain Members - Pure Xbox
articles.description: It seems to be mainly a European thing
articles.content: We've obviously all well aware of the Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass price hike that's rolling out in most regions right now, but certain members are potentially not being affected by it - … [+2878 chars]
